DOC.brief_summary: The hip semiendoprosthesis acceptable method treat proximal femoral fracture . Traditionally , cement version semiendoprosthesis use indication . However , cement carry risk fat embolism pressurization cement . The fat embolism avoid use non-cemented semiendoprosthesis . In study want find whether difference treatment result cement non-cemented semiendoprostheses treat proximal femoral fracture .
DOC.brief_title: Cemented vs Non-cemented Semiendoprosthesis Treatment Proximal Femoral Fractures
DOC.criteria: A proximal femoral fracture Rheumatoid arthritis Pathologic fracture Severe dementia ( prevent inform consent )
